source_sentence: 佛頂大白傘蓋陀羅尼經
translation: Fodingda baisangai tuoluoni jing
Tripiṭaka of the Grand Secretary of the Guanglu Dafu

source_sentence: 法師沙囉巴奉　詔譯
translation: Translated by the Fashi Salopa in response to an imperial decree
Thus I've heard.

source_sentence: 一時婆伽梵在三十三天善法堂中。
translation: One time, the Bhagavān was in the Trāyastriṃśa Heaven's hall of fine dharma.

source_sentence: 與諸比丘諸大菩薩天主帝釋無量眾俱。
translation: He was accompanied by an incalculable multitude of monks, great bodhisattvas, and the god Indra.
At the time, the Bhagavān spread out his seat and sat down.

source_sentence: 即入普觀烏瑟尾沙三昧。
translation: He then entered the samādhi of universal contemplation of Uṣaḍa.
The bhagavān then suddenly removed his topknot.
He displayed a mysterious, subtle practice of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 南謨一切諸佛諸大菩薩眾　南謨佛陀耶　南謨達摩耶　南謨僧伽耶　南謨七俱胝佛諸大聲聞眾　南謨世間所有阿羅漢眾　南謨一切預流眾　南謨一切一來眾　南無一切不還眾　南謨世間諸正行眾　南謨諸向正行眾　南謨以呪詛厭禱亦能饒益諸大天仙眾　南謨成就持明眾　南謨大梵天王眾　南謨天主帝釋眾　南謨嚧陀囉(二合)耶烏摩般帝娑醯夜耶眾　南謨無愛子五大手印而敬禮眾　南謨摧三界城樂處寒林母鬼恭敬摩訶迦辣眾　南謨婆伽梵如來俱囉耶　南謨蓮華俱囉耶　南謨金剛俱囉耶　南謨寶珠俱囉耶　南謨大象俱囉耶　南謨孺童俱囉耶　南謨龍種俱囉耶　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覽勇堅部器械王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺無量光佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺不動尊佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺藥師瑠璃光王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺娑羅樹華普遍開敷王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺釋迦牟尼佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺寶幢王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺普賢王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺毘盧遮那佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺廣目優鉢羅華香幢王佛如是敬禮諸佛等已。
translation: 南謨一切諸佛諸大菩薩眾　南謨佛陀耶　南謨達摩耶　南謨僧伽耶　南謨七俱胝佛諸大聲聞眾　南謨世間所有阿羅漢眾　南謨一切預流眾　南謨一切一來眾　南無一切不還眾　南謨世間諸正行眾　南謨諸向正行眾　南謨以呪詛厭禱亦能饒益諸大天仙眾　南謨成就持明眾　南謨大梵天王眾　南謨天主帝釋眾　南謨嚧陀囉(二合)耶烏摩般帝娑醯夜耶眾　南謨無愛子五大手印而敬禮眾　南謨摧三界城樂處寒林母鬼恭敬摩訶迦辣眾　南謨婆伽梵如來俱囉耶　南謨蓮華俱囉耶　南謨金剛俱囉耶　南謨寶珠俱囉耶　南謨大象俱囉耶　南謨孺童俱囉耶　南謨龍種俱囉耶　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覽勇堅部器械王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺無量光佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺不動尊佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺藥師瑠璃光王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺娑羅樹華普遍開敷王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺釋迦牟尼佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺寶幢王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺普賢王佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺毘盧遮那佛　南謨婆伽梵如來應正等覺廣目優鉢羅華香幢王佛如是敬禮諸佛等已。

source_sentence: 婆伽婆帝佛頂大白傘蓋無有能敵。
translation: The great white canopy on top of the Buddha's head was invincible.
It's like a pāramitā (a two-combination) that's like a cocklebur.
It's capable of destroying all the many ghosts and demons in the world.
He breaks all bright spells and frees you from fetters.
She'll be free of untimely deaths and bad dreams of grief and distress.

source_sentence: 摧壞八萬四千妖魔及八執曜。
translation: It destroys 84,000 demons and the eight obsessions.

source_sentence: 復能使令二十八宿生大歡喜。
translation: It also causes the twenty-eight constellations to become very joyous.

source_sentence: 亦能移迴一切冤害所有一切起毒害者。
translation: It also can remove all wrongs and all those who cause harm.
All of these bad dreams are extinguished.

source_sentence: 又能救除毒藥器械水火等難。
translation: It also saves poisonous instruments, floods, fires, and other hardships.

source_sentence: 無敵大勢力　　暴惡大力母
translation: He's invincible and powerful, and he's a powerful mother of violence.

source_sentence: 熾盛威光母　　白蓋大力母
translation: Tejaprabhā Mother of Radiance White Covered Maitreya

source_sentence: 焰鬘白衣母　　多羅[頻/足]蹙相　稱鬘勝金剛　　蓮相金剛相　具鬘無能敵　　金剛牆摧母　諸善天恭敬　　善相大威光　救度大力母　　金剛鋜諸等　金剛童持種　　持杵種金鬘　赭色寶珠母　　光明金剛鬘　窈窕母持杵　　眼如金光母　金剛炬白母　　蓮華日月光諸手印眾願擁護我願擁護我。
translation: "The white-robed mother of the flaming garland, the tura[frequency/foot] knitted form, the garland called superior to the vajras, the lotus form, the vajra form, the garland that has no equal, the mother of the vajra-wall-destroying lotus, the respect of the good gods, the great authority and light of the good form, the mother of great power that saves and liberates, the vajra-bandits and so forth, the vajra-boy holding the seeds of the pounder, the ochre-colored mother of the precious pearl, the bright vajra garland, the fair mother holding the pounder, the mother with eyes like gold light, the white mother of the vajra-torch, the lotus-sun-moon radiance, all the hand-seals, may I be embraced, may I be embraced.

source_sentence: 唵唎瑟羯拏般囉(二合)舍悉多(二合)耶(一)薩唎嚩(二合)怛他伽跢(二)烏瑟尼沙悉怛(引)怛鉢帝唎(二合)吽覩嚧雍(二合三)暫鉢拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合四)悉耽(二合)嚩拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合五)摩喝拏伽唎吽覩嚧雍(二合六)摩訶逼姪耶(二合)三囉佉拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合七)鉢囉逼姪耶(二合)三嚩佉拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合八)薩唎嚩(二合)覩瑟怛(二合)喃(九)悉耽(二合)鉢拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)薩唎嚩(二合)藥叉囉剎薩吃囉(二合)訶喃毘耽薩拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)拶覩囉尸底喃(十)吃囉(二合)訶薩訶悉囉(二合)喃(十)毘耽薩拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)阿室恒(二合)頻舍帝喃拏叉怛囉(二合)喃鉢囉(二合)薩怛拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)阿室怛(二合)喃摩訶吃囉(二合)訶喃毘耽薩拏伽唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)囉叉囉叉[合*牛]願擁護我願擁護我　婆伽婆帝佛頂大白傘蓋金剛頂髻般囉(二合)當雞囉母千手千臂。
translation: 唵唎瑟羯拏般囉(二合)舍悉多(二合)耶(一)薩唎嚩(二合)怛他伽跢(二)烏瑟尼沙悉怛(引)怛鉢帝唎(二合)吽覩嚧雍(二合三)暫鉢拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合四)悉耽(二合)嚩拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合五)摩喝拏伽唎吽覩嚧雍(二合六)摩訶逼姪耶(二合)三囉佉拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合七)鉢囉逼姪耶(二合)三嚩佉拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合八)薩唎嚩(二合)覩瑟怛(二合)喃(九)悉耽(二合)鉢拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)薩唎嚩(二合)藥叉囉剎薩吃囉(二合)訶喃毘耽薩拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)拶覩囉尸底喃(十)吃囉(二合)訶薩訶悉囉(二合)喃(十)毘耽薩拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)阿室恒(二合)頻舍帝喃拏叉怛囉(二合)喃鉢囉(二合)薩怛拏迦唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)阿室怛(二合)喃摩訶吃囉(二合)訶喃毘耽薩拏伽唎吽覩嚧雍(二合十)囉叉囉叉[合*牛]願擁護我願擁護我　婆伽婆帝佛頂大白傘蓋金剛頂髻般囉(二合)當雞囉母千手千臂。
He has a hundred thousand koṭīnas of vision.

source_sentence: 不二熾[火*盛]之相金剛廣大母。
translation: With the characteristic of nonduality and blazing [fire*exuberance], he's the adamantine, vast mother.
Within the three realms, she attains great mastery.
May I be supported, and may I be supported.

source_sentence: 唵國王怖賊寇怖火怖水怖。
translation: "Om, the king is afraid of thieves and pirates, afraid of fire, afraid of water, and afraid of poison, medicine, weapons, and other weapons.

source_sentence: 毒藥怖兵器怖他兵來侵怖。
translation: He's afraid of poisonous medicines, afraid of weapons, and afraid of attacks from other soldiers.

source_sentence: 饑饉怖冤害怖疾疫怖霹靂怖。
translation: fear of famine, fear of injury, fear of epidemics, fear of thunderbolts, and fear of death at an untimely hour.

source_sentence: 非時橫死怖地震動怖星射怖。
translation: Untimely death fears, earthquake fears, star-shot fears.

source_sentence: 獄怖天怖龍怖電怖飛空怖惡獸怖。
translation: 'Horrors of hell, horrors of gods, horrors of dragons, horrors of lightning, horrors of flying air, and horrors of bad animals.'
"Also, there are celestial demons, dragon demons, and non-celestial demons.

source_sentence: 風神魅飛空魅尋香魅人非人魅。
translation: The wind god charm, the flying-air charm, the perfume seeker charm, and humans and non-humans charm.

source_sentence: 大腹行魅施礙魅羅叉魅餓鬼魅。
translation: The great belly-crawling demon, the obstructive demon, the lakṣa demon, and the hungry ghost demon.

source_sentence: 空行母魅食肉魅部多魅。
translation: The hollow-walking demon is a flesh-eating demon, and the Bhūtā demon is a demon.

source_sentence: 甕腹魅臭鬼魅奇臭鬼魅。
translation: The jar-belly charming, foul-smelling demon charming, and strange-smelling demon charming.
The Śakandha charm, the faint-minded charm, and the subversive charm.
The demon demon, the vermin demon, and the Lepati demon.
Among those ghosts and māras, I wish to be put at ease.
"Also, they're spirit-eaters, energy-eaters, and breath-eaters.
Those who eat womb, those who eat blood, and those who eat ointment.
He's a flesh-eater, a fat-eater, and a marrow-eater.
Those who eat maternity, those who take life, and those who eat vomit.

source_sentence: 食不淨者食小便者食漏水者。
translation: He eats impurity, eats urine, and eats leaking water.

source_sentence: 食殘食者食吐者食涎者。
translation: Those who eat leftover food, those who eat vomit, and those who eat saliva.

source_sentence: 食涕者食膿者食施食者。
translation: Those who eat tears, those who eat pus, and those who eat charity food.

source_sentence: 食鬘者食香者食香氣者。
translation: Those who eat garlands ... those who eat incense ... those who eat fragrance ...
He who takes his mind and eats flowers and eats fruit.

source_sentence: 食五穀者食燒施者　於是等中願安隱我。
translation: Those who eat grains and those who eat burnt alms. Among these, may I be tranquil.

source_sentence: 如是等眾及諸鬼魅所造明呪。
translation: Such a multitude of people and the incantations created by ghosts and spirits.
They'll all be removed.
Pin the Vajra-stele biography.
These are incantations created by omnipresent spirits.
They all sever and remove the spells that nail Vajra-studs.
The wisdom spell created by the mother of empty practices and empty practices.
They all end nails and adamantine jewelry.
A spell created by Mahāprajñāpatī.
They all sever nails and remove stubborn nails.
All of the bright spells created by the son of Akṣobhya will end nails in the vajra-statement.
They all end nails and diamond jewelry.
All of the bright spells created by the Flying Air Orthodox congregation.
All of them will end the nails and the vajra-starred.

source_sentence: 摩訶迦辣諸母鬼眾所造明呪。
translation: Mahākāla's wisdom spells created by a multitude of mother spirits.
They all sever nails and remove adamantine charts.
The spells created by the skull-bearers are all good spells that will stop nails in the vajra-starred state.
They all sever nails and remove adamantine chains.

source_sentence: 能勝作蜜辦諸事業所造明呪。
translation: All of the bright spells created by those who are skilled in the art of making honey.
They all end nails and diamond jewelry.
All of the incantations created by the four sisters will end nails and bars.
They all sever their vajra-stripped heads and remove their pins.

source_sentence: 毘訖利帝慾樂自在集主等眾所造明呪。
translation: The spell created by Vikritya, the Collector of Desires, Pleasures, and Ecstasy, and many others.
They all sever the nails and remove the vajra-starred heads.
A spell created by a group of people who desire, enjoy, and assemble goodness.
They all sever the nails and remove the adamantine jewelry.
All of the bright spells created by arhats will end nails and bars.
They all end the nails and diamond jewelry.
All of the bright spells created by those who are free from desire stop nails and are diamond-starred.
They all end the nails to the adamantine socks.
Every incantation created by the hidden track vajra hands stops nails and bars.

source_sentence: 悉皆斷除釘金剛鐝　南謨婆伽婆帝佛頂大白傘蓋母願擁護我願擁護我。
translation: They all end nails and stop vajra-stripping.

source_sentence: 復有起嗔恨心者　起毒害心者　起暴惡心者　天魅眾　龍魅眾　非天魅眾　風神魅眾　飛空魅眾　尋香魅眾　人非人魅眾　大腹行魅眾　藥剎魅眾　囉剎魅眾　餓鬼魅眾　空行母魅眾　食肉魅眾　部多魅眾　甕腹魅眾　臭鬼魅眾　奇臭鬼魅眾　塞建陀魅眾　昏忌魅眾　顛魅眾　魘魅眾　伏魅眾　利鉢帝魅眾　焰魔魅眾　禽魅眾　母鬼喜魅眾　遍羅魅眾　除棘魅眾或有疫熱病。
translation: Also, there are those who become angry, those who become harmful, and those who become violent and evil gods, gods and dragons, non-godly gods and goddesses, wind gods and gods of the air, scent-seeking gods and gods of the air, human and non-human gods, great belly-crawling gods, Yakṣa gods, Rāṣa gods, hungry ghosts and goddesses of the air, flesh-eating gods, Bhūtā gods, urn-belly gods, foul-smelling gods, strange-smelling gods, Skandha gods, jealous gods, nightmares, subduing gods, Lipatī gods, blazing gods, fowl gods, mother ghosts, joyful gods, pervasive gods, Vṛji gods, or epidemic fever.
They may be sick for a day, two days, three days, or four days.
They might have a fever that's constant, or they might have a fever that's extremely troublesome.
They may have a feverish illness that lasts two, three, or four days, or a feverish illness that's constant, or a feverish illness that's extremely troublesome.
They may have wind, yellow phlegm, or numerous combinations of illnesses.
He'll get rid of all feverish illnesses, headaches, and half-headaches.

source_sentence: 願皆消除復有硬曀病眼病。
translation: I wish they'd all go away. Also, there's stiffness and obscuration sickness and eye sickness.
Nose trouble, mouth trouble, facial trouble, and heart trouble.
Throat pain, earaches, toothaches, and heartaches.
Brain pain, flank pain, back pain, and abdominal pain.

source_sentence: 腰痛隱密處痛髀痛腨痛。
translation: Low back pain, pain in the hidden places, thigh pain, and gut pain.
Hand pain, foot pain, and other limb pains.

source_sentence: 願令消除願擁護我　大白傘蓋金剛頂髻般囉(二合)當鷄囉母。
translation: May it be removed and may it embrace me! The great white umbrella with the vajra's topknot, the bunched-up banner, is the mother of all kings.
It forms the vajradhātu sector for 12 yojanas.

source_sentence: 所有部多起屍空行母等。
translation: It's for all the tribes that give rise to corpses, empty bodies, and so forth.
They're suffering from demonic fever, sores, scabies, and ringworm.

source_sentence: 漏癎癰疽痒疔枯澁風驚。
translation: They suffer from epilepsy, abscesses, gangrene, itching, furuncles, blisters, and windstorms.
Jewel poisons, insect poisons, and prayer, water, and fire.

source_sentence: 怨恨冤家惱害非時橫死。
translation: They are harassed by enemies and resentful people and die untimely deaths.

source_sentence: 復有底麻補伽蜂底辣怚蚖蛇蝮蝎鼠毒。
translation: There's also the poison of the demapogs, bees, bee, dewlings, dumbwaiters, snakes, vipers, scorpions, and rats.
They're like dragons, tigers, lions, bears, and wolves.
They're like poisonous bees that snatch and kill people.
They're all bound by a bright spell called 'Vātsīpaṇḍa.'
They're bound by authoritative spells.
They're bound by bright spells.
All demons and ghosts are also fettered.

source_sentence: 哆姪耶(二合)他唵阿拏隷阿拏隷(二)毖瑟帝毖瑟帝(三)鼻(引)囉鼻(引)囉(四)嚩日囉(二合)陀(引)唎(五)斑陀斑陀(六)嚩日囉(二合)跋尼發吒(七)吽吽發吒發吒(八)吽覩嚧雍(二合)斑陀發吒莎嚩訶(九)若人齎此佛頂大白傘蓋般囉(二合)當鷄囉母陀羅尼經。
translation: 哆姪耶(二合)他唵阿拏隷阿拏隷(二)毖瑟帝毖瑟帝(三)鼻(引)囉鼻(引)囉(四)嚩日囉(二合)陀(引)唎(五)斑陀斑陀(六)嚩日囉(二合)跋尼發吒(七)吽吽發吒發吒(八)吽覩嚧雍(二合)斑陀發吒莎嚩訶(九)若人齎此佛頂大白傘蓋般囉(二合)當鷄囉母陀羅尼經。

source_sentence: 或以樺皮貝葉素[疊*毛]書寫是已。
translation: He might write it on a piece of birch-skin, shell, leaf, or [pile*hair] paper.
He might carry it on his body or tie it around his neck.

source_sentence: 當知是人盡其生年毒不能害。
translation: You should know that person's life is spent, and the poison can't harm them.

source_sentence: 并諸器械水火寶毒蠱毒呪詛皆不能害。
translation: Neither instruments, fire, water, fire, precious poison, nor poisonous spells and curses can harm him.
Nor will he die young.
There are all kinds of ghosts, demons, and other beings who see them and aren't delighted.
There's nothing they don't see that makes them rejoice.
There are 84,000 members of the Vajra group.
They rejoice greatly and always guard them.

source_sentence: 於八萬四千大劫之中得宿命智。
translation: During 84,000 great eons, they'll attain knowledge of their past lives.

source_sentence: 生生世世不生藥叉羅剎富單那迦吒富單那畢部多鬼等諸惡趣中。
translation: They won't be born in the Yakṣa Rāṣa, Pūtanakāṭa, or Pūtanapuṇḍarīka, or among other bad destinies like ghosts.
Nor will they be born into poverty or lowliness.

source_sentence: 獲得無量無邊恒河沙數諸佛福德之聚。
translation: He'll attain the measureless and limitless number of merit accumulations of the buddhas.

source_sentence: 若人持此佛頂大白傘蓋般囉(二合)當雞囉母陀羅尼經者。
translation: If a person holds this Dhāraṇī of the great white umbrella at the Buddha's head, he'll become a religious practitioner even if he doesn't practice chastity.
Those who don't practice chastity will also become a practitioner of chastity.
Whoever doesn't observe precepts also becomes observant of them.
He who isn't pure becomes pure.
He who doesn't practice puṣya becomes puṣya.
Whoever doesn't observe purification also becomes purified.

source_sentence: 若有五無間罪及無始來所有宿殃。
translation: If there are five kinds of unremitting sins and all the past evils from beginningless time, then their old sins will be extinguished without remainder.
Their past karmic transgressions are completely extinguished without remainder.
Suppose there's a woman who wants to meet a man.

source_sentence: 能受持斯佛頂大白傘蓋般囉(二合)當雞囉母陀羅尼經者。
translation: If she can accept and uphold this Dhāraṇī of the great white umbrella of the Buddha's crown, then she'll become a man of wisdom.
He'll then give birth to a man of wisdom.
His merits, longevity, and powers of form will be perfected.

source_sentence: 命終之後隨得往生極樂國土。
translation: After his life ends, he'll then be reborn in the land of paradise.

source_sentence: 若遭人病孳畜病疫癘惱害鬪諍逼迫他兵侵擾一切厄難。
translation: If he suffers from human illness, breeding animals, epidemics, harms, fights, persecution, harassment by other soldiers, or any other misfortune, then he'll be granted this great white umbrella over the Buddha's head.

source_sentence: 賚此佛頂大白傘蓋無有能敵。
translation: RIP this great white umbrella over the Buddha's head that has no match.

source_sentence: 般囉(二合)當雞囉母陀羅尼。
translation: It's a dhāraṇī of the pāramitā-kṛṣṇa mother.

source_sentence: 繫幢頂上廣伸供養作大佛事。
translation: Tying it to the top of the banner, he extensively makes offerings to make great Buddha-work.
They welcome this dhāraṇī and place it at the four gates of their city.
Some villages, towns, and towns in the countryside.
They worship, revere, and whole-heartedly make offerings to him.
All the armies and battles will then cease.
They'll be sickened by epidemics, afflicted by diseases, and fights.

source_sentence: 他兵侵擾一切災厄悉皆消滅。
translation: All calamities and troubles caused by the aggression of other armies are all extinguished.

source_sentence: 跢姪耶(二合)他(一)唵瑟覩嚧甕(二合二)斑陀斑陀(三)願擁護我願擁護我莎嚩訶(四)囉叉囉叉[牟*含]唵吽瑟覩嚧甕(二合)斑陀斑陀(二)嚩日囉(二合)願擁護我(三)囉叉囉叉[牟*含](四)嚩日囉(二合)鉢尼夷吽發吒莎嚩訶(五)唵薩唎嚩(二合)多他伽跢(一)烏瑟尼沙　阿嚩盧雞帝(三)牟唎(二合)陀帝佐囉(引)瑟(四)　唵拶辣拶辣(一)伽陀伽陀(二)陀囉陀囉(三)毖陀囉毖陀囉(四)親陀親陀(五)頻陀頻陀(六)吽吽發吒發吒薩嚩訶(七)唵薩唎嚩(二合)多他伽跢烏瑟尼沙吽發吒發吒莎嚩訶　跢姪耶(二合)他唵阿拏隷(二)阿拏隷(三)伽薩彌(四)伽薩彌(五)鼻(引)囉(六)鼻(引)囉(七)莎(引)彌(八)莎(引)彌(九)薩唎嚩(二合)佛陀(十)阿帝瑟他(二合)拏(十一)阿帝瑟提(二合)帝(十二)薩唎嚩(二合)多他伽跢(十三)烏瑟尼沙(十四)悉怛多鉢底唎(二合十五)吽發吒莎嚩訶(十六)吽麻麻吽尼(十七)莎嚩訶(十八)若能依佛修習。
translation: 跢姪耶(二合)他(一)唵瑟覩嚧甕(二合二)斑陀斑陀(三)願擁護我願擁護我莎嚩訶(四)囉叉囉叉[牟*含]唵吽瑟覩嚧甕(二合)斑陀斑陀(二)嚩日囉(二合)願擁護我(三)囉叉囉叉[牟*含](四)嚩日囉(二合)鉢尼夷吽發吒莎嚩訶(五)唵薩唎嚩(二合)多他伽跢(一)烏瑟尼沙　阿嚩盧雞帝(三)牟唎(二合)陀帝佐囉(引)瑟(四)　唵拶辣拶辣(一)伽陀伽陀(二)陀囉陀囉(三)毖陀囉毖陀囉(四)親陀親陀(五)頻陀頻陀(六)吽吽發吒發吒薩嚩訶(七)唵薩唎嚩(二合)多他伽跢烏瑟尼沙吽發吒發吒莎嚩訶　跢姪耶(二合)他唵阿拏隷(二)阿拏隷(三)伽薩彌(四)伽薩彌(五)鼻(引)囉(六)鼻(引)囉(七)莎(引)彌(八)莎(引)彌(九)薩唎嚩(二合)佛陀(十)阿帝瑟他(二合)拏(十一)阿帝瑟提(二合)帝(十二)薩唎嚩(二合)多他伽跢(十三)烏瑟尼沙(十四)悉怛多鉢底唎(二合十五)吽發吒莎嚩訶(十六)吽麻麻吽尼(十七)莎嚩訶(十八)若能依佛修習。
All the celestials and dragon kings will rain down sweet rain in accordance with the seasons.
They send down sweet rain in due order.

source_sentence: 爾時一切諸佛諸大菩薩天龍藥叉徤達縛阿素洛揭路荼緊捺洛莫呼洛伽人非人等。
translation: At the time, all the buddhas, great bodhisattvas, celestials, dragons, yakṣas, gods, tathāgatas, asuras, hellhounds, humans, nonhumans, and so forth.
All the people who heard what the Buddha taught rejoiced greatly and believed and handed it down.
They all rejoiced greatly and believed and approved.

source_sentence: 佛頂大白傘蓋陀羅尼經
translation: Fodingda baisangai tuoluoni jing
